name: Cruelty Free International
legal: Company incorporated as private limited by guarantee
bossPosition: Deputy Chief Executive & Director of Finance
memberOrga: Cruelty Free International does not have members per se, but has donors and supporters from EU member states and beyond.
goal: Cruelty Free International is working to create a world where nobody wants to or believes they need to experiment on animals.
interests: Consumers, Environment, External Relations, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives:
- EU cosmetics policy
- EU animal welfare policy issues
- International trade policy, especially relating to research animals
- EU policy relating to use of animals in scientific research
- REACH
- The development of alternatives to animal tests
